text:
Mr. M. 8. Hovik
Municipal Broadcasting System
Municipal Building
New York City
Dear Mr. Novik:
On March 6 I wrote you on behalf of
the National Association of Educational Broad¬
casters, inviting you to associate with us
in NAEB. Perhaps you haven*t gotten around
to replying or maybe the letter was misplaced.
3o I am writing to let you know that the in¬
vitation still stands.
If there is anything additional that
yor wish to know about NAEB, I shall be most
happy to send this information to you.
It may Interest you to know that the
University Broadcasting Council, of Chicago,
and Indiana University affiliated with our
organisation within the last ten days.
Cordially yours.
Frank E. Sohooley
FES: EH
